Failed cluster attempts

Failed cluster attempts

Trying to get smooth polygons:

Try to convert lines to polys, Bivand style:

table(sapply(lns, function(x) length(slot(x, “Lines”))))

lclusts <- sapply(lns, function(x) { crds <- slot(slot(x, “Lines”)[[1]], “coords”) identical(crds[1, ], crds[nrow(crds), ]) }) table(lclusts) lls <- SLDF[6,lclusts] plot(lls) plot(lclusts, col=”red”)

plot(SLDF[6,], add=T) lbc <- gIntersection(lb, SLDF[6,]) plot(lbc) ```

Let’s try it with clusterset:
